  <script>
    const KR = n => (Number(n)||0).toLocaleString('ko-KR');
    const $ = sel => document.querySelector(sel);
    const el = (tag, attrs={}, children=[]) => {
      const d = document.createElement(tag);
      Object.entries(attrs).forEach(([k,v])=>{
        if(k==='class') d.className=v;
        else if(k==='text') d.textContent=v;
        else if(k==='value') d.value=v;
        else d.setAttribute(k,v);
      });
      children.forEach(c=>d.appendChild(c));
      return d;
    };

    // 기본값 0 (요청 반영)
    const DEF = {
      bizName:'', bizPhone:'', bizEmail:'',
      baseFee:0, baseDistanceKm:0, extraPerKm:0,
      noElevPerFloor:0, weekendRate:0, helperFee:0,
      items:[
        {id:'i1',label:'',price:0,unitLabel:'개'},
        {id:'i2',label:'',price:0,unitLabel:'개'},
        {id:'i3',label:'',price:0,unitLabel:'개'},
        {id:'i4',label:'',price:0,unitLabel:'개'}
      ]
    };
    const LSKEY = 'haul_embed_cfg_v2_zero_default';

    let CFG = loadCfg();
    let STATE = {
      distanceKm: 0, floors: 0, hasElevator: true, helpers: 0, weekend: false,
      items: Object.fromEntries((CFG.items||[]).map(i=>[i.id,0]))
    };

    function loadCfg(){ try{const raw=localStorage.getItem(LSKEY); if(raw) return JSON.parse(raw);}catch{} return JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(DEF)); }
    function saveCfg(){ try{localStorage.setItem(LSKEY, JSON.stringify(CFG));}catch{} }

    function itemsSum(){ return (CFG.items||[]).reduce((s,i)=> s + (Number(STATE.items[i.id]||0) * (Number(i.price)||0)), 0); }
    function calc(){
      const base = +CFG.baseFee || 0;
      const distExtra = Math.max(0, (+STATE.distanceKm||0) - (+CFG.baseDistanceKm||0)) * (+CFG.extraPerKm||0);
      const floorExtra = STATE.hasElevator ? 0 : Math.max(0, +STATE.floors||0) * (+CFG.noElevPerFloor||0);
      const helperExtra = (+STATE.helpers||0) * (+CFG.helperFee||0);
      const subtotal = base + itemsSum() + distExtra + floorExtra + helperExtra;
      const weekendMul = STATE.weekend ? (1 + (+CFG.weekendRate||0)) : 1;
      const total = Math.round(subtotal * weekendMul);

      $('#vBase').textContent   = KR(base) + '원';
      $('#vItems').textContent  = KR(itemsSum()) + '원';
      $('#vDist').textContent   = KR(distExtra) + '원';
      $('#vFloor').textContent  = KR(floorExtra) + '원';
      $('#vHelper').textContent = KR(helperExtra) + '원';
      $('#vMul').textContent    = '× ' + weekendMul.toFixed(2);
      $('#vTotal').textContent  = KR(total) + '원';
    }
    function refreshLabels(){ $('#cfgBaseKmLabel').textContent = CFG.baseDistanceKm; $('#cfgPerKmLabel').textContent = KR(CFG.extraPerKm); }

    function bindItems(){
      const wrap = $('#itemsList'); wrap.innerHTML='';
      (CFG.items||[]).forEach(it=>{
        const qty = +(STATE.items[it.id]||0);
        const row = el('div',{class:'item'},[
          el('div',{},[
            el('div',{text: (it.label||'(품목명 직접 입력)'), class:'title', style:'font-weight:600;font-size:14px'}),
            el('div',{text: (it.unitLabel||'개') + '당 ' + KR(it.price) + '원', class:'muted'})
          ]),
          el('div',{},[ el('input',{class:'input',type:'number',value:qty,id:'qty_'+it.id}) ])
        ]);
        wrap.appendChild(row);
        row.querySelector('input').addEventListener('input',e=>{ STATE.items[it.id]=+(e.target.value||0); calc(); });
      });
    }

    function bindAdmin(){
      $('#bizName').value=CFG.bizName||''; $('#bizPhone').value=CFG.bizPhone||''; $('#bizEmail').value=CFG.bizEmail||'';
      $('#cfgBaseFee').value=CFG.baseFee; $('#cfgBaseKm').value=CFG.baseDistanceKm; $('#cfgPerKm').value=CFG.extraPerKm;
      $('#cfgNoElev').value=CFG.noElevPerFloor; $('#cfgWeekend').value=CFG.weekendRate; $('#cfgHelper').value=CFG.helperFee;
      refreshLabels();

      const adminWrap = $('#adminItems'); adminWrap.innerHTML='';
      (CFG.items||[]).forEach((it, idx)=>{
        const row = el('div',{class:'row'},[
          el('input',{class:'input',value:it.label,placeholder:'품목명'}),
          el('input',{class:'input',value:it.unitLabel||'개',placeholder:'단위(개/대/세트 등)'}),
          el('input',{class:'input',type:'number',value:it.price,placeholder:'단가(원)'}),
          el('button',{class:'btn',text:'삭제'})
        ]);
        const [iLabel,iUnit,iPrice,btnDel]=row.querySelectorAll('input,button');
        iLabel.addEventListener('input',e=>{ CFG.items[idx].label=e.target.value; saveCfg(); bindItems(); });
        iUnit.addEventListener('input',e=>{ CFG.items[idx].unitLabel=e.target.value; saveCfg(); bindItems(); });
        iPrice.addEventListener('input',e=>{ CFG.items[idx].price=+(e.target.value||0); saveCfg(); calc(); bindItems(); });
        btnDel.addEventListener('click',()=>{ CFG.items.splice(idx,1); saveCfg(); bindAdmin(); bindItems(); calc(); });
        adminWrap.appendChild(row);
      });
    }

    // Admin events
    $('#bizName').addEventListener('input',e=>{ CFG.bizName=e.target.value; saveCfg(); });
    $('#bizPhone').addEventListener('input',e=>{ CFG.bizPhone=e.target.value; saveCfg(); });
    $('#bizEmail').addEventListener('input',e=>{ CFG.bizEmail=e.target.value; saveCfg(); });
    $('#cfgBaseFee').addEventListener('input',e=>{ CFG.baseFee=+(e.target.value||0); saveCfg(); calc(); });
    $('#cfgBaseKm').addEventListener('input',e=>{ CFG.baseDistanceKm=+(e.target.value||0); saveCfg(); refreshLabels(); calc(); });
    $('#cfgPerKm').addEventListener('input',e=>{ CFG.extraPerKm=+(e.target.value||0); saveCfg(); refreshLabels(); calc(); });
    $('#cfgNoElev').addEventListener('input',e=>{ CFG.noElevPerFloor=+(e.target.value||0); saveCfg(); calc(); });
    $('#cfgWeekend').addEventListener('input',e=>{ CFG.weekendRate=+(e.target.value||0); saveCfg(); calc(); });
    $('#cfgHelper').addEventListener('input',e=>{ CFG.helperFee=+(e.target.value||0); saveCfg(); calc(); });

    // Items admin
    document.getElementById('addItem').addEventListener('click',()=>{
      const id='itm_'+Math.random().toString(36).slice(2,8);
      CFG.items.push({id,label:'',price:0,unitLabel:'개'});
      saveCfg(); STATE.items[id]=0; bindAdmin(); bindItems(); calc();
    });
    document.getElementById('applyItems').addEventListener('click',()=>{ saveCfg(); bindItems(); calc(); });
    document.getElementById('btnExport').addEventListener('click',async()=>{
      const text=JSON.stringify(CFG,null,2);
      try{ await navigator.clipboard.writeText(text); alert('설정을 클립보드에 복사했습니다.'); }
      catch{ alert(text); }
    });
    document.getElementById('btnImport').addEventListener('click',()=>{
      const text=prompt('붙여넣기 할 설정 JSON을 입력하세요:'); if(!text) return;
      try{ CFG=JSON.parse(text); saveCfg(); bindAdmin(); bindItems(); calc(); }
      catch{ alert('JSON 파싱 실패'); }
    });
    document.getElementById('btnReset').addEventListener('click',()=>{
      CFG=JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(DEF)); saveCfg(); bindAdmin(); bindItems(); calc();
    });

    // customer inputs
    $('#distanceKm').addEventListener('input',e=>{ STATE.distanceKm=+(e.target.value||0); calc(); });
    $('#floors').addEventListener('input',e=>{ STATE.floors=+(e.target.value||0); calc(); });
    $('#helpers').addEventListener('input',e=>{ STATE.helpers=+(e.target.value||0); calc(); });

    function setElev(has){ STATE.hasElevator=has; $('#elevYes').classList.toggle('active',has); $('#elevNo').classList.toggle('active',!has); calc(); }
    document.getElementById('elevYes').addEventListener('click',()=>setElev(true));
    document.getElementById('elevNo').addEventListener('click',()=>setElev(false));

    function setWeekend(on){ STATE.weekend=on; $('#wkYes').classList.toggle('active',on); $('#wkNo').classList.toggle('active',!on); calc(); }
    document.getElementById('wkYes').addEventListener('click',()=>setWeekend(true));
    document.getElementById('wkNo').addEventListener('click',()=>setWeekend(false));

    // copy/share/pdf
    function buildQuoteText(){
      const date=new Date().toLocaleString();
      const itemsStr=(CFG.items||[])
        .map(i=>`${i.label||'(품목)'} ${STATE.items[i.id]||0}${i.unitLabel||'개'}`)
        .filter(s=>!/ 0$/.test(s))
        .join('\n');

      const base=+CFG.baseFee||0;
      const distExtra=Math.max(0,(+STATE.distanceKm||0)-(+CFG.baseDistanceKm||0))*(+CFG.extraPerKm||0);
      const floorExtra=STATE.hasElevator?0:Math.max(0,+STATE.floors||0)*(+CFG.noElevPerFloor||0);
      const helperExtra=(+STATE.helpers||0)*(+CFG.helperFee||0);
      const subtotal=base+itemsSum()+distExtra+floorExtra+helperExtra;
      const weekendMul=STATE.weekend?(1+(+CFG.weekendRate||0)):1;
      const total=Math.round(subtotal*weekendMul);

      return [
        `[가정 대형 폐기물 내림 대행 견적]`,
        `일시: ${date}`,
        CFG.bizName?`업체: ${CFG.bizName}`:null,
        CFG.bizPhone?`연락처: ${CFG.bizPhone}`:null,
        CFG.bizEmail?`이메일: ${CFG.bizEmail}`:null,
        ``,
        `거리(왕복): ${STATE.distanceKm}km`,
        `층수: ${STATE.floors}층 / 엘리베이터 ${STATE.hasElevator?'있음':'없음'}`,
        `보조 인력: ${STATE.helpers}명`,
        `주말/야간: ${STATE.weekend?'적용':'미적용'}`,
        ``,
        itemsStr?`품목:\n${itemsStr}`:`품목: 없음`,
        ``,
        `예상 결제 금액: ${KR(total)}원`,
        `(대형폐기물 스티커 비용 별도 · 대행 서비스 예상가)`
      ].filter(Boolean).join('\n');
    }

    document.getElementById('btnCopy').addEventListener('click',async()=>{
      const text=buildQuoteText();
      try{ await navigator.clipboard.writeText(text); alert('견적 내용을 클립보드에 복사했습니다.'); }
      catch{ alert(text); }
    });

    document.getElementById('btnShare').addEventListener('click',()=>{
      const text=buildQuoteText();
      if(navigator.share){ navigator.share({title:'가정 대형 폐기물 내림 대행 견적',text}); }
      else{ alert('이 브라우저는 공유 기능을 지원하지 않습니다. 복사 기능을 이용하세요.'); }
    });

    document.getElementById('btnPDF').addEventListener('click',()=>{
      if(!window.jspdf){ alert('PDF 라이브러리가 로드되지 않았습니다.'); return; }
      const {jsPDF}=window.jspdf; const doc=new jsPDF(); const left=14; let y=20;
      doc.setFontSize(16); doc.text('가정 대형 폐기물 내림 대행 견적서', left, y); y+=8;
      doc.setFontSize(11);
      const bizLine=[CFG.bizName,CFG.bizPhone,CFG.bizEmail].filter(Boolean).join('  •  ');
      if(bizLine){ doc.text(bizLine,left,y); y+=8; }
      doc.text(`작성일시: ${new Date().toLocaleString()}`,left,y); y+=10;

      [['거리(왕복)',`${STATE.distanceKm} km`],
       ['층수/엘리베이터',`${STATE.floors}층 / ${STATE.hasElevator?'엘리베이터 있음':'없음'}`],
       ['보조 인력',`${STATE.helpers} 명`],
       ['주말/야간',STATE.weekend?'적용':'미적용']]
       .forEach(r=>{ doc.text(`${r[0]}: ${r[1]}`,left,y); y+=7; });

      y+=3; doc.setFont(undefined,'bold'); doc.text('품목',left,y); doc.setFont(undefined,'normal'); y+=7;
      (CFG.items||[]).forEach(i=>{ const q=+STATE.items[i.id]||0; if(q>0){ doc.text(`- ${i.label||'(품목)'}: ${q}${i.unitLabel||'개'}`,left,y); y+=6; } });

      const base=+CFG.baseFee||0, distExtra=Math.max(0,(+STATE.distanceKm||0)-(+CFG.baseDistanceKm||0))*(+CFG.extraPerKm||0);
      const floorExtra=STATE.hasElevator?0:Math.max(0,+STATE.floors||0)*(+CFG.noElevPerFloor||0);
      const helperExtra=(+STATE.helpers||0)*(+CFG.helperFee||0);
      const subtotal=base+itemsSum()+distExtra+floorExtra+helperExtra;
      const weekendMul=STATE.weekend?(1+(+CFG.weekendRate||0)):1;
      const total=Math.round(subtotal*weekendMul);

      y+=4; doc.setFont(undefined,'bold'); doc.text(`예상 결제 금액: ${KR(total)}원`,left,y); doc.setFont(undefined,'normal'); y+=8;
      doc.setFontSize(10); doc.text('※ 지자체 대형폐기물 스티커 비용은 별도(실비)입니다.', left, y);
      doc.save('견적서.pdf');
    });

    // 초기화
    function postHeight(){ try{ var h=document.documentElement.scrollHeight; parent.postMessage({type:'CALC_RESIZE',height:h},'*'); }catch(e){} }
    function init(){ bindAdmin(); bindItems(); calc(); postHeight(); }
    window.addEventListener('load', init);
    window.addEventListener('resize', postHeight);
    setTimeout(postHeight, 300);

    // 간단 테스트
    (function(){
      try{
        const t = buildQuoteText();
        console.assert(t.includes('예상 결제 금액'), '금액 줄 누락');
        const id0 = CFG.items[0].id; STATE.items[id0]=2;
        const t2 = buildQuoteText();
        console.assert(t2.includes('2'), '품목 수량 반영 실패');
      }catch(e){ console.warn('Dev test 실패', e); }
    })();
  </script>
</body>
</html>

업로드 체크리스트

  • 경로가 정확히 -2/index.html 인지 확인

  • 업로드 후 접속은 https://jsh0333.github.io/-2/?v=1 처럼 ?v=1을 붙여 캐시 무력화

  • GitHub 저장소 Settings → Pages 에서 Source가 main / root 인지 확인

필요하시면 제가 상호/연락처/이메일 기본값을 박은 버전도 만들어 드릴게요.


ChatGPT는 실수를 할 수 있습니다. 중요한 정보는 재차 확인하세요.
